name: ASAuthorizationProviderAuthorizationOperation
desc: A type that represents an authorization operation.

items.name: static let configurationRemoved: ASAuthorizationProviderAuthorizationOperation
items.desc: An operation the system invokes when the extension configuration is removed from the system.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates an authorization operation using the specified string value.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an authorization operation using the specified raw string value.
